listing.listing_description: Views of the picture-perfect sapphire sea meet sophisticated contemporary living spaces at Villa Baan Fan Noi. This stunning four-bedroom Koh Samui villa boasts thoughtful architecture that showcases the views from its perch over Chaweng Beach, as well as a thoughtful staff that will ensure you and up to eight friends or family members are pampered during your stay.Your holiday at Villa Baan Fan Noi begins with an airport transfer and includes the services of a villa manager, driver, housekeeper and Thai chef. For your comfort, the villa has air conditioning and 24-hour security; for your convenience, babysitting service is available at extra cost. This means you can relax and soak in the tropical sun from outdoor living areas with plenty of loungers around an infinity pool, or unwind inside with the help of the TVs, Wi-Fi and wine cellar.The great room of this modern vacation rental rivals the outdoor living spaces for views, thanks to its fold-away glass walls. Pared-down furnishings such as wicker chairs and tuxedo-style sofas lend an easy sophistication in the open-concept living and dining areas. A tranquil courtyard with a water feature separates them from the sleek, fully equipped kitchen.Each of the four bedrooms at this luxury residence is a honeymoon-worthy retreat with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, living area and private terrace. Nearly wall-to-wall sliding glass doors can be pushed open to let the warm breezes flow through, and for more indulgent moments, two of the bedrooms have stand-alone soaking tubs.From the villa’s hillside location, it’s just a 5-minute drive to the island’s main ring road at Chaweng, which will bring you to some of Koh Samui’s best beaches, liveliest oceanfront bars and restaurants, and the thriving bistro scene at the famed Fisherman’s Village in Bophut. For an only-here day trip, head to Wat Plai Laem, or the Big Buddha Temple, or Na Muang Safari Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Baan Chang is the most expansive and exclusive of the six stunning villas that make up the Dhevatara Cove Estate on Koh Samui’s secluded eastern shore. This five bedroom, private beachfront residence is nestled into a tranquil cove with mature, tended tropical gardens that extend through the ample grounds and open onto an undisturbed stretch of sandy beach. Lose yourself in this Thai oasis!With tall French windows in every room sliding open to welcome in the soothing views and peaceful island surroundings, Baan Chang blurs borders when it comes to indoor/outdoor living. The villa’s huge private pool offers a constant, easily enjoyed opportunity to cool off, with plenty of cushioned sun loungers on the deck for relaxing days on the sun terrace or reclining in comfort on the beach. Your spacious villa includes a television, DVD player, music system, Wi-Fi, internal garden, hot tub, beachside terrace, outdoor speakers and a two-person kayak. Your staff, including a housekeeper, Thai chef and manager, are there to ensure a hassle free visit.High, pinnacled ceilings in the living and bedroom pavilions, along with a liberal use of top quality natural materials and an abundance of Thai silk also lend the villa a strong sense of exoticism. Despite an atmosphere of royal antiquity, Baan Chang is also a very modern holiday villa, fitted with the latest home technology and furnished throughout with unique pieces like the impressive, circular dark wood table in the dining room and the huge sofa-daybed in the lounge poised in front of an LED Smart TV.With a total of five bedrooms, Villa Baan Chang can accommodate up to ten guests. Each bedroom includes a fluffy double bed and en-suite bathroom. All the spacious en-suite bedrooms open onto meditative ocean or garden views and also boast indulgent bathtubs for the ultimate private soak.The name Chang means elephant in Thai and the kingdom’s famous royal beast is beautifully represented throughout the property, from the giant statues in the garden at the entrance to delightful, hand-painted sliding doors on the television cabinet in the lounge. With beachside access to Lipa Noi, one of the most spectacular beaches in Thailand, the bounty of the tropics are right at your door. Enjoy the luxury of Koh Samui at Villa Baan Chang!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Rethink your idea of a vacation rental at Samujana Twenty-Two. Originally designed as two villas, this property has nearly 29,000 square feet of living space, six suite-style bedrooms and outdoor entertaining areas to rival those of any resort. Book this luxury haven on Koh Samui for an idyllic family reunion, corporate event, wellness retreat or even an intimate destination wedding.Your stay at the exclusive Samujana estate includes breakfast and airport transfers. Unwind in the tropical sunshine on the villa’s terrace, which has an infinity pool stretching toward the ocean, living and dining areas, and plenty of loungers. A private gym, games room and lounge area, and home theater let you keep up with your routine, challenge other guests to a little friendly competition or simply relax after a day of exploring.An open-sided great room makes the most of a gorgeous location, letting warm breezes waft over the sitting and dining areas and one of two fully equipped kitchens. The furnishings are sleek, modern and perfectly positioned to afford views of the ocean. Weathered wood coffee tables, stone feature walls and polished tile add subtle organic texture to the contemporary space.Samujana Twenty-Two has five bedrooms with king beds and one with two twin beds; all six have en-suite bathrooms, sitting areas and terraces overlooking the ocean, so that every guest gets to spend their holiday in a room with the best views.Though it’s tempting to spend your stay ensconced in the villa, there’s something for everyone to see and do on Koh Samui. From the estate’s location near Plai Laem, it’s only 5 minutes to relaxed, family-friendly Choeng Mon Beach and the livelier oceanfront mix of restaurants and bars along Chaweng Beach. Ask Samujana staff for help booking a honeymoon-worthy yacht charter around the island, a thrilling fishing, scuba or snorkeling excursion or an exciting zipline tour.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Glam Habitat offers gorgeous luxury vacation rentals along the western edge of Phuket within walking distance of Kamala Beach—one of the most serene and enchanting coastlines in all of Thailand. This three-bedroom villa features a private swimming pool, ample roof deck, exquisite alfresco and interior living spaces, and deluxe accommodations for eight, an ideal vacation rental for families and groups of friends. Just a short drive from Phuket International Airport, it's also an excellent choice for destination wedding guests.The fabulous roof deck enjoys beautiful views of the coastal hills, while the villa's private terrace with swimming pool provides a dreamy setting for relishing the South Pacific sun. Sliding glass doors invite the exquisite air into the home, and allow you to step directly from the living room into the pool's delicious waters.Indoors, the high windows and beautiful hanging curtains provide a wonderful balance of luminosity and privacy within the open-concept living area. Sip a fine wine in the sumptuous lounge while watching TV. Prepare delicious Thai feasts in the fully equipped gourmet kitchen, and relish them around the elegant dining table. Exquisite furnishings and traditional objets d'art evoke a timeless Thai enchantment within the thoroughly contemporary design. Air conditioning, Wi-Fi, multiple safes, and the villa's excellent staff ensure total comfort and peace of mind.The villa features three superb king bedrooms, all with ensuite bathrooms featuring stand-alone shower and tub. Each suite enjoys a private balcony, lounge area, safe, desk, and television. The master suite additionally includes a walk-in closet, dressing area, and dual vanity. Furnished and designed with minimalist yet sumptuous elegance, the bedrooms provide individuals and couples with a tranquil and stylish setting for downtime and rest.Glam Habitat enjoys an extraordinary position on the island Phuket. Just a short walk to the serene Kamala Beach, you're also within minutes of Surin and several other world-class beaches. where you can stroll the white sand at sunset. The area is also a golfer's dream, with Laguna Golf Phuket and Phuket Country Club both within easy reach. Royal Phuket Marina is easily reachable by car.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located amongst vibrant tropical greenery and mature palms, this spectacular ocean-view four-bedroom villa has the perfect mix of privacy and proximity. Within minutes, you’ll find yourself on the sandy shores of Bophut and Maenam Beaches, shopping in downtown Bophut, or hitting the links at Santiburi Country Club.Kya’s color scheme and open-air layout are right on point. With soothing cream tones highlighted by light-wood trim, an outstanding number of windows and openings, and hints of ocean-inspired turquoise, Kya sets the mood for an unforgettable getaway. With all of its common spaces and bedrooms facing the ocean view, Kya lets vibrant colors of Koh Samui’s natural surroundings provide the excitement, while fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight create a relaxing ambiance.Villa Kya’s infinity pool is about as sophisticated as can be. With three-tiers and a swim-up bar, you’ll have plenty of space for swimming, lounging on built-in bar stools, and there’s an easy to monitor, shallow area for the kids. You’ll also have an incredible view of the ocean from each level of the pool. Another great vantage point on the terrace is the Moon Deck, which is located a two-levels above the pool and features a custom designed circular couch. Along the rest of the outdoor space, you’ll find sun loungers, sun beds, alfresco dining, and lush tropical greenery decorating Kya’s relaxing terrace.No trip to Koh Samui is complete without visiting the Island’s nightlife capital, Chaweng. By day, Chaweng is a vibrant beachfront community, perfect for family fun, water sports, sunbathing, and delicious beachfront cuisine. At night, head to the Green Mango Strip to revel in a wide range of bars, pubs, dance clubs, and other exciting nightlife destinations. On the southern end of Chaweng’s main strip, you’ll find the city’s most popular bar, Tropical Murphy’s Irish Pub, which is especially exciting during football season.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: A veritable Thai hamlet, this stunning ten bedroom beachfront private resort offers a magical Southeast Asian experience. Its location on the serene island of Koh Yao Noi affords otherworldly views of the dramatic limestone karst formations of Phang Nga Bay. The estate’s remarkable design from Naga Concepts was inspired by the temples of Northern Thailand. Get the sublime rest and rejuvenation you deserve with Luxury Retreats!Perfect for weddings, private events and corporate retreats, the facilities and amenities include a one hundred foot oceanfront swimming pool, a water slide and children’s pool, a therapist-staffed spa and fitness center, watersports equipment, a yoga pavilion, multiple dining venues and a cooking class facility. In addition to the boutique perks of the estate itself, a wide range of activities embracing the local flair are offered – cave kayaking, mountain biking, rock climbing and cooking classes with your personal chef.If the word ‘Zen’ could be brought to life it would be in exactly these surroundings. Sacred pergolas, flawless design and mythic rock formations across the sea make Ani Villas Thailand a true embodiment of balance and harmony with one’s natural surroundings. Water features and dramatic columns offer a glimpse of the mastery required in equalizing the forces of yin and yang. And the wet bar will be a delight for the consummate entertainer!Ten gorgeous bedrooms accommodate up to twenty guests at Ani Villas Thailand. All of the bedrooms feature king sized beds and en-suite bathrooms. The bedrooms have been spread over five guests houses, which is great for groups seeking oscillations of social time and privacy. The guest house with four bedrooms offers a private courtyard pool.Guests of Ani Villas Thailand are transferred to the property from either the Phuket or Krabi international airports by helicopter (10 minutes) or private car or boat (50 minutes). This fully staffed and serviced private estate for families and groups seeking the most exquisite vacations includes daily housekeeping, premier spirits, house wines, soft drinks and juices, all-day snacks and cocktail service, spa services, unlimited movie and music streaming, complimentary international calling and a daily children’s activity program. If you are looking to unwind in style, this is it!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Contemporary design blends seamlessly into the tropical landscape at Samujana Six. This gorgeous Koh Samui vacation rental features beautifully appointed indoor-outdoor living areas that make it easy to relax, entertain and enjoy the warm weather. The villa’s five bedrooms can accommodate up to ten friends or family members, and luxury amenities help everyone bliss out.A stay at Samujana begins with an airport transfer and includes breakfast each day. Once you’ve started the morning right, claim one of the loungers or sun beds by the villa’s saltwater infinity pool, keep up with your routine in the fitness area or take in the ocean views from the rooftop terrace. Keep the low-key vibe going with dinner from the barbecue or a quiet evening in the home theater.The many levels of Samujana Six follow the slope of the hillside and showcase views of the water. The heart of the villa, however, is a stunning open-sided great room with sitting and dining areas and a fully equipped kitchen. A sleek sectional, mod lounge chairs, clean-lined dining table and inviting breakfast bar are both stylish and smart.Everyone in your party will feel indulged by a holiday spent in the villa’s five bedrooms, all of which have king beds, en-suite bathrooms, their own sitting areas and private terraces with ocean views. Sliding glass doors let you open the suites to the terraces, and open-plan layouts mean you can look out at the water from the bathrooms if you’d like.Samujana is just above the quiet beach of Plai Laem, and 5 minutes from both family-friendly Choeng Mon Beach and lively Chaweng Beach, where you’ll find a beautiful stretch of sand along with oceanfront restaurants and exciting nightlife. If you’re on honeymoon—or wish you were—ask the estate staff to arrange a yacht charter to take you to hidden coves; if you want to stay active, they can assist with booking tee times at local golf courses, fishing excursions and more.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: From its awe-inspiring location on a forested headland, Hale Malia watches imperiously over the Indian Ocean. This magnificent villa blends nature and luxury seamlessly to bring you perfection in paradise. Laze on a lounger by its iridescent infinity pool and you’ll be caressed by the sun and the soft breeze from the Andaman Sea. Gather for sundowners at sunset against a backdrop of fragrant plants and lush vegetation. Here, on the exclusive Samsara estate, you will be enveloped in peace and relaxation.Perched majestically above the dazzling sea and rocky coastline, Hale Malia truly is the height of luxury. It has been skilfully designed to blur the distinction between indoor and outdoor living with acres of glass and open space. From your wrap-around terrace you can slip into the sensual embrace of a turquoise pool which appears to stretch to the horizon. Under the shelter of your columned gazebo you can enjoy a relaxed barbecue accompanied by the stars. In this villa at one with its surroundings you can be at one with yourself.Clad in local stone and enhanced with attractive Asian woodwork, Hale Malia blends into its environment beautifully. Descend the wooden steps from the entrance to its spacious living room and you’ll be greeted by a vast glass-fronted atrium. Under this impressive awning sit comfortable sofas and chairs arranged to give you spectacular views. Within these walls you’ll also find an elegant dining area and relaxed home theater. A sensuous sauna and steam room add to the allure alongside a peaceful Yoga pavilion. During your stay you’ll be cared for by your attentive chef and butler.Each of this villa’s four spacious and inviting bedrooms looks out over the radiant sea. Designed to give you total flexibility in your sleeping arrangements they feature everything from king-sized beds to comfy twins. Gleaming bathrooms boast elegant china fittings and soothing showers. From the master suite you can recline in your own jetted tub overlooking the ocean.Ensconced in this rural retreat surrounded by nature you can escape from your day-to-day cares. But this property also gives you access to an array of Phuket attractions. A short five minute drive takes you to the quiet beach and sleepy resort of Kamala where you can play tennis and pick up essentials. Further along the coast you’ll find the bright lights of Patong. This thriving, bustling town offers a complete alternative from the secluded relaxation of Hale Malia.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Hale Malia is one of a select handful of private residences located within the Samsara Estate. Few, if any, private enclaves in the world match the unsurpassed luxury and privacy of Samsara. Straddling a secluded peninsula, it is a stunning juxtaposition of rocky shoreline, tropical gardens, and calming blue waters. Perched dramatically between 40 to 60 meters above sea level, these oceanfront villas offer spectacular panoramic views to the west and north over the Andaman Sea and Nakalay beach and to the south across Patong Bay.

listing.listing_description: The ideal spot for entertaining large groups, twenty-four is the biggest and most amenity filled villa in the Samujana development. Indoor and outdoor areas are spacious enough for a large amount of guests, merging seamlessly in an open concept design. Perfect for the sunrise and sunset, views from the terrace look out to the south and west over the Gulf of Thailand and all eight of the bedrooms have an amazing ocean view.With numerous outdoor living and dining spaces, an infinity pool and hot tub, garden, and an outdoor kitchen, the terrace is the hot spot for hosting. Moving inside, guests will enjoy formal dining for fourteen, a games room, cinema room, and an entertainment lounge with a pool table. If you’re feeling like keeping up your daily routines, there is an office and a fitness area. Breakfast, airport transfer, twenty-four hour security, and daily housekeeping are all included as well.Floor to ceiling windows, large openings to the terrace, and simplistic decorations let the natural beauty of the ocean environment fully immerse the indoor living space. Subtle wood and stone accents give hints of traditional Thai building materials, while contemporary design provides the luxurious comforts of a high end vacation rental. Whether you’re chatting with friends over a glass of wine, lounging by the pool, or curled up for a movie, the options for social spaces are endless.Each of the eight bedrooms at twenty-four are identical in their features, and they all have a fantastic ocean view. King sized beds, lounge areas, safes, and private terraces make each bedroom a master. As well, they all have their own ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone rain showers, bathtubs, and bidets.Within minutes from the villa you will find numerous beaches, scenic golf courses and country clubs, and the absolutely amazing Ko Samui Rainforest. And if you feel like a trip into the city, take a stroll down main street for fine dining, boutique shops, and exciting nightlife.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Breathtaking scenery, incredible service and thoughtful details all come together at the stunning Praana Residence. Perched on a hilltop amid verdant rainforests above the crystal-clear Gulf of Samui, this Koh Samui vacation rental boasts service and amenities that rival those of larger five-star properties in the more private setting of the Panacea Retreat Residences. Six suite-style bedrooms mean you can bring family and friends to discover this hidden gem of Thailand luxury.Your holiday at Praana Residence begins with a complimentary airport transfer and includes the services of a chef, housekeeper, butler and security guard. You’ll be treated to freshly prepared cookies and smoothies throughout your stay, as well as a yoga or massage session and Muay Thai, tennis or cooking lesson on the private outdoor boxing ring and tennis court. Two infinity pools, one of which has a swim-up bar, and a sprawling terrace with a row of lounge chairs provide ample room to soak in the tropical sun, while a pergola-covered outdoor sitting room is a shaded spot to relax. In the evenings, cook at the outdoor kitchen and dine at the al-fresco dining area or step inside to enjoy the home theater, games room or the dance floor in the private nightclub. Kids will love the separate nursery and playroom, while adults will want to indulge in the steam room and sauna.The villa’s beautifully designed interiors emphasize the surrounding forests and sea with walls of glass covered by traditional peaked roofs. In the great room in the main pavilion, natural-fiber rugs help define the sitting and dining areas in an organic way, and white upholstery and cane-backed chairs create a refined yet casual look. Though your stay includes chef service, the great room also has a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar, so cooks can still be in the middle of the conversation and enjoy the panoramic views.Each of the villa’s six bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom. There are five bedrooms with king beds, including one master suite with a hot tub, ocean views and a balcony, one with ocean views and a balcony and one that opens directly to the terrace. The sixth bedroom has two twin beds. After a day at a nearby beach or practicing boxing or tennis, the bedrooms’ neutral tones and natural textures are a serene respite.Book your tickets into Samui Airport, about 9 km from the villa. Once you’ve arrived at Praana Residence, you can explore the nearby Fisherman’s Village, Big Buddha Temple, and town of Chaweng. Stroll along the Nathon or Koh Samui piers, get a closer look at the forests outside your windows in the Koh Samui Rainforest, stay up at the Nathon Night Food Market or meet the locals at the Namuang Safari Park. You’ll also have your choice of beaches for playing in the water or taking a honeymoon-worthy stroll, from Bophut Beach, 3 km away, to Chaweng and Maenam beaches, about 8 km away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The Samujana Estate in Koh Samui is home to beautiful Thai inspired luxury villas. Built on a hillside overlooking the ocean, this vacation rental is positioned perfectly for capturing the sunrise. With golf, city life, and shared access to the estate’s private beachfront, villa Nineteen is a great home base for your Thai holiday.Surrounded by lush green vegetation and fresh ocean breeze, Nineteen’s open atmosphere integrates Thailand’s natural environment seamlessly. This multi-tiered villa is designed with sleek straight sight lines, making use of the hillside to build up, rather than deep, optimizing the number of spaces with ocean views. The living areas, both inside and out, are minimalistic and sophisticated. Brightly coloured designer furniture creates a contrast with the neutral tones of the villa’s interior. Wood and stone accent walls are found throughout the living room and bedrooms, adding character to each unique space. The kitchen follows suit, sleek and stylish, equipped with high end appliances. Red cabinetry, to match the couch, sets the kitchen area apart, giving it a different ambience within the open concept floor plan.Inside the villa you’ll find formal dining for six, an espresso machine, wine fridge, sound system, Wi-Fi, television, and more. Included with rental, there’s daily housekeeping, airport transfer, and breakfast. Out on the terrace, sun beds, loungers, and living areas surround the infinity pool. And, for an even better ocean view, pour yourself a glass of wine and head up to the balcony to gaze upon the endless sea.Each of the four bedrooms are identical in their features. King beds, ensuites with showers, bathtubs, and bidets, lounge areas, and access to a private terrace make it easy for everyone to have their own personal oasis.If you feel like exploring the area, the Ko Samui Rainforest, Bohput Hills Golf Club, and Choeng Mon Beach are all just a few minutes drive from Samujana’s estate. Each option is a great way to appreciate Thailand’s dynamic environment.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Perched on the outermost plot of the Samsara peninsula, Villa Leelavadee strikes a beautiful balance between graceful grandeur and classic Asian design. This home successfully combines elegance with rich furnishings and spine-tingling views over Patong Harbor. Panoramic wraparound outdoor decks frame a 14-meter infinity-edge pool which dissolves into the Andaman Sea. Glass panels along the pool’s bottom look into the rooms below.The villa includes a fully equipped home exercise room, games room, projection television room, and built-in sauna. A private outdoor jetted tub adjoins the master bedroom – perfect for a late evening soak by moonlight. A spacious outdoor dining area, built-in barbecue, and poolside sunning areas complement the outdoor decking.The interior and exterior of the property are traditional Thai in style, transporting you to an oasis of tropical serene. The villa is serviced by full time, live-in staff consisting of one cook and one housekeeper. Trained to anticipate your needs, they’ll look after you with an infectious blend of Thai graciousness and charm. The estate’s manager and front office team complement the villa’s permanent staff, and are available to provide an unmatched level of truly personal service throughout your stay. Picture yourself enjoying a delicious Thai meal in the evening while you look out over the ocean and chat about your day with your loved ones. If you do want to use the kitchen yourself during your stay, you’ll find everything you need to cater for your breakfast, lunch or dinner.Leelavadee at Samsara has five bedrooms in total, all of which have an unobscured view of the ocean. Four of the rooms have en-suite facilities and all are air conditioned to ensure a comfortable night’s sleep. The master bedroom has its own private veranda with jetted tub for the ultimate in vacation relaxation.Away from the villa, there’s plenty to see and do in nearby Kamala, and of course Phuket. There are beaches just a short walk away with unblemished sands and gentle breezes that let you know you truly are in your own little part of paradise. If you’re feeling active, there’s a gym, tennis courts and golf course all within easy reach of the property so you can work up an appetite before heading out on the town in Phuket or just savoring a delicious meal back at Leelavadee at Samsara. Look forward to a terrific Thai vacation.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

Leelavadee is one of a select handful of private residences located within the Samsara Estate. Few, if any, private enclaves in the world match the unsurpassed luxury and privacy of Samsara. Straddling a secluded peninsula, it is a stunning juxtaposition of rocky shoreline, tropical gardens, and calming blue waters. Perched dramatically between 40 to 60 meters above sea level, these oceanfront villas offer spectacular panoramic views to the west and north over the Andaman Sea and Nakalay beach and to the south across Patong Bay.

listing.listing_description: Positioned on the corner of the Samujana estate, this four bedroom luxury villa boasts breathtaking views, amazing outdoor living spaces, and outstanding modern contemporary design. With golf, beaches, fine dining, boutique shops, and even a rainforest all within a few minutes, Samujana is a truly dynamic location for your Thai retreat.With no shortage of dining options, you’ll find ample space for entertaining both inside and out. Formal dining for eight, a breakfast bar, alfresco dining, and a barbeque equipped outdoor living space make it easy to cater to any mood. The multiple levels of this luxury villa display the view of the mountains and ocean from so many amazing perspectives. Indoors you’ll find a study, a lounge, a fully equipped kitchen, and a surround sound system.Contemporary open concept architecture makes the spaces of Samujana flow beautifully into each other. Integrating indoor and outdoor spaces together, while combining local stone building materials with clean straight sightlines, gives the villa a slightly traditional feel. Muted tones and floor to ceiling windows give Samujana a subtle tranquility, while the local artwork placed throughout provides an interesting splash of color. Wooden accents and designer furniture promote the perfect vibe for relaxing inside the living room.Each of the four bedrooms at Samujana is identical in their features. King sized beds, ensuite bathrooms with a rain shower and bathtub, bidet, and a lounge area, make it easy for everyone to enjoy their privacy. With private access to the terrace, each bedrooms has its own unique view.Mere minutes away from the villa, you’ll find access to Choeng Mon & Chaweng beacc and the Ko Samui rainforest. If you feel like an afternoon on the golf course, Bohput Hills Golf Club features some of the best view of the mountains and is the only championship quality course on the island.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please note that there is construction near this villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.Experience the luxury service of a resort in the seclusion of a private home at Villa Mia. This dreamy Koh Samui vacation rental is fully staffed and has incredible indoor and outdoor living areas set back from the beach by a lawn. The oceanfront location is perfect for a relaxed family reunion, birthday or anniversary celebration with friends or even a tropical destination wedding.Your holiday at Villa Mia includes a round-trip airport transfer, daily continental breakfast, in-villa spa treatments such as massages, and the services of a trained Thai chef, housekeeper and property manager. This leaves you free to enjoy the villa’s gorgeous infinity pool, loungers and sun beds, al-fresco living and dining areas, and an outdoor kitchen with a barbecue and wet bar. Explore the bay in the double kayak, take the kids to the playground and stay active in the villa’s fitness room.Villa Mia is designed to help you bask in the lush beachfront setting, with its outdoor living pavilion sunk into the pool and sliding glass doors that open the interiors to the ocean breeze. Like the al-fresco areas, the open-plan living spaces are comfortably stylish, with high ceilings, natural-fiber rugs and a fresh palette of white furnishings, from the sofa and dining chairs to the sleek cabinets in the fully equipped kitchen.You’ll feel like you’re honeymooning again in the villa’s five bedrooms, each of which has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and lounge area, and opens to the terrace. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are beautifully furnished with a mix of natural textures and crisp white furnishings and upholstery, all accented by colorful pieces like floral-print pillows, botanical artwork and elegant vases.Though it’s located on Chaweng Beach, Villa Mia has a quiet, secluded feel. At low tide, take a scenic stroll out to the neighboring island of Koh Matlang, or walk down the beach to explore Chaweng’s famed restaurants and bars. There are two golf courses only a short drive away, and for a unique, only-in-Thailand adventure, spend an afternoon at Wat Plai Laem (the Big Buddha temple) or Canopy Adventures Secret Falls.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Plan your Phuket holiday in a place where the sea meets the sky at Malaiwana - Villa M. Perched above Nai Thon Beach in the island’s Thalang area, this luxury vacation rental affords panoramic views of the water—and resort-worthy indoor and outdoor spaces from which to enjoy them. Invite up to ten friends for a getaway spent exploring this corner of tropical paradise or extended family for an utterly relaxed vacation.Your stay at Malaiwana includes the services of a villa manager, cook, housekeeper and guard. Spend lazy days watching fishing boats move across the Andaman Sea from outdoor living areas with an infinity pool, and ample spots for lounging, sitting and dining, keep up with your routine in the indoor fitness room or indulge in the spa area. In the evenings, enjoy dinner from the barbecue, then settle into the entertainment and games area or serve refreshments from the bar.While Villa M draws its architectural inspiration from traditional Thai houses, with its dramatically pitched roof and airy spaces, the furnishings are all contemporary. Tones of sleek black and fiery red-orange create a hip, lounge-like vibe in the open-concept living and dining areas in the great room. If you want to supplement the cook service with a snack, there is a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.The villa has four bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a lounge area, terrace access and sea views, and one bedroom with two twin beds. All five bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms.Use Villa M as your private retreat on Phuket or as a base for exploring the island. It’s just a short walk from Malaiwana to popular Nai Thon Beach, and a short drive to several other beaches, the Banyan Tree Spa, a choice of shopping areas and two golf courses.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located in the ultra-desirable Surin Beach enclave on the West Coast of Phuket, Villa Chan Grajang enjoys exquisite views over Surin Beach and Bang Tao. The house stands high above the bay facing northwest with sunsets out over the Indian Ocean you’ll look forward to night after night. Villa Chan Grajang is comprised of two villas, over a total of over 2,272 square meters.In the grounds of the villa, the Balinese outdoor wooden table seats 12 and is ideal for BBQs or breakfast, while the dining room with its solid teak table and views out over Surin Beach offers a cooler internal option. The games room sports a 3/4 size snooker table, dart board, bar area, as well as television and DVD player. The main villa boasts a stunning infinity pool ideal for recreation or laps. There is a Sala for those in-house massages, as well as a fully functional exercise room with cable television and equipped with exercise machines.The first villa has four double bedrooms and the second has two double bedrooms. All bedrooms are en-suite. The villa can sleep up to 12 comfortably, with parking for six cars and offers choices from a six bedroom hire all the way down to a single couple. Four of the six bedrooms have their own furnished deck areas.Unique to the house is a 30 metre all-weather chipping and putting area on the lower lawn, providing hours of entertainment for kids as well as an extensive grassy areas for them to play in. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

listing.listing_description: Located minutes from Trisara Resort’s private beach club, this luxurious three-bedroom will make your next Luxury Retreats beach getaway a breeze. Situated on the oceanside hills of Phuket, this modern rental captures spectacular ocean views and incredible sunsets from its private perch. Nearby, you’ll find plenty more beachfront areas to explore along Phuket’s pristine coast. There are numerous towns and fishing villages in the area, rich with historical sites, adventure tourism, and delicious Thai cuisine, all yours to discover on your next Luxury Retreats beach vacation.From the exterior, waterfalls, lush gardens, and ocean views decorate the Ocean Residence. Wide openings along the terrace invite Phuket’s natural beauty to seamlessly flow within the interior spaces, enhancing the social, open concept atmosphere. All three en-suite bedrooms feature king-sized beds. The two masters have private balconies and amazing ocean views, while the third comes with direct access to the terrace and a refreshing garden view.During your stay, you’ll have access to Trisara Resort’s boutiques, golf course, bar, tennis, and fitness facilities. There’s also plenty of weekly events to check out on Trisara’s schedule. Inside, features like Wi-Fi, television, and air conditioning will keep you cool and connected. On the terrace, you’ll love the swimming pools, generous lounge areas, barbecue, and alfresco dining.After you’ve spent some time enjoying the sand and surf at Trisara’s private beach, venture off resort to experience some of the most popular beach areas among Phuket locals, like Naithon Beach, just a few minutes from home. Naithon’s white sand and crystal waters provide the setting for vibrant beach fun with plenty to see and do in the surrounding area. If you’re in the mood for a more laid back beach trip, Dream Beach Club may be the perfect place for you. If there’s a golfer in your group, Laguna Phuket Golf Club is a course with incredibly scenic views and lush, challenging fairways. And, if you’re in the mood to shop, The Boat Avenue Mall is just nine kilometers from Trisara.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Laguna Waters is a peaceful, serene vacation home built amongst lush tropical greenery and situated on the edge of a small lake in Phuket’s most upscale beach community, Bang Tao. With luxurious accommodations for ten and plenty of spacious indoor and outdoor areas for guests to explore, this private villa is perfect for a family getaway, island party with friends, or a smaller scale corporate retreat.Thai architecture is ideal for tranquility and relaxation. Wide doors, across the entire main and upper floor, open to allow the free-flowing natural breeze to fill the interior. Merging of indoor and outdoor spaces, and an open-concept floor plan make Laguna Waters ideal for hosting a social event. Comfortable, designer furniture fills the living room, which leads to the terrace, where you’ll find even more cozy seating. The kitchen has a bright, functional atmosphere with plenty of counter space and high-end stainless steel appliances. Just off the kitchen, the formal dining area seats eight and has three extra spaces at the breakfast bar. There’s also a wine fridge, ice maker, dishwasher, and a Nespresso coffee maker in the fully equipped kitchen.Although the interior is gorgeous, you’ll probably want to spend a lot of your time soaking up the sun by the swimming pool, hot tub, or from a lounger on the terrace. There’s also an alfresco dining set with seating for ten, should you decide to dine out under the stars. After dinner, grab a bottle of wine and head up to the balcony for a quiet evening looking out over the lake. If you’re feeling more energetic, there’s an exercise room, pool table, bar, and Sonos sound system to keep you entertained through the night. And, Laguna Waters comes with housekeeping, security, and a babysitting service.Within the Laguna complex, just a few minutes from the villa, you’ll have access to restaurants, shopping, recreational activities, and their spa. There’s also a private beach club with white sandy shores and calm waters, and an eighteen-hole golf course, just minutes away.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Malouna lies along tranquil Laem Noi Beach on the northern shore of Koh Samui in Thailand. About 150 feet of pristine beachfront, opulent vegetation and breathtaking views make this exceptional setting ideal for a family holiday or a special celebration like a wedding or anniversary. Just a short swim or kayak ride from the beach lies a colorful coral reef, perfect for snorkelers, while at dawn, you can watch the local fishermen quietly lay their nets for the day’s catch.After passing through Villa Malouna’s oversized wooden doors into its secluded tropical garden with frangipanis and birds of paradise, you will find the heart of the villa, a ninety foot infinity swimming pool adorned with emerald green Sukabumi stones. Perfect for laps or relaxing dips, the pool also has a shallow area for children. A wide wooden deck, made of sustainable wood from the Netherlands, has been equipped with welcoming silver-grey beanbags and offers guests a voluptuous setting for reading or taking a nap.The architecture of this vacation rental has been conceived in synergy with the island’s natural surroundings, lush vegetation and lagoon views. Inspired by Zen and mid-century modern architecture, the villa is contemporary yet authentic. The open plan design makes the most of the island’s cool breezes and light. A stunning black open kitchen features Tom Dixon copper lighting and a solid wood dining table. The black kitchen is used for breakfasts and serving, while another service kitchen lies in the staff area for more elaborate dishes. With the in-house chef, exclusive culinary experiences include improvised picnics on the beach, a romantic dinner or a beach barbeque.The six bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms are located in three separate bedroom pavilions. Each bedroom has a modern and spacious black terrazzo bathroom with rain shower that open to a private back garden. All bedrooms are minimalistic to create a serene and relaxing atmosphere. The bunk room is sure to be a hit with children!The villa manager will handle your special requests for candle lit dinners, yoga sessions and excursions. Of course, there is always the option of enjoying a drink under a parasol on the powdery sand beach just footsteps away. A perfect oceanfront oasis with luxury services, tailor-made activities and modern architecture, Villa Malouna invites you for the vacation you deserve!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Glam Habitat is an exquisite complex of luxury residences on the western shore of Phuket in Thailand. Located within walking distance of Kamala Beach, the complex also enjoys close proximity to some of the finest golf courses in Thailand. This four-bedroom, five-bath villa features a private swimming pool along with exquisite alfresco and interior living spaces, making it an ideal vacation rental for families or groups of friends.The gorgeous pool terrace and expansive roof deck invite you to enchanting days and evenings in the South Pacific light. Lush tropical hedges and trees surround the pool, giving it the feel of a secluded, crystalline lagoon just outside your living room. Sliding glass walls welcome the exquisite coastal air into the home.The open-concept living area is ideal for elegant evenings together. Sip wine and watch your favorite shows in the sumptuous lounge with flat-screen TV. Prepare meals in the stylish, fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar, and gather for dinner at the beautiful dining table. High ceilings, ample windows, and exquisite furnishings made of natural materials evoke Phuket's rich natural beauty, while lovely hanging curtains distill the sunlight into an enchanting luminosity. The villa also features a second, spacious lounge with sumptuous sofa facing a TV, as well as a desk for work or study. The outstanding staff includes a villa manager, housekeeping, and 24-hour security guard.The villa features four bedroom suites: three with king beds and one with a queen bed. The superb king bedrooms all have ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone shower and tub, and each enjoys a private balcony, lounge area, safe, desk, and television. The master suite additionally includes a walk-in closet, dressing area, and dual vanity.Glam Habitat enjoys one of the finest locations on Phuket. You're a short walk to Kamala Beach, where you can stroll the white sand at sunset, while Surin Beach is just a few minutes by car. Several other world-class beaches are an easy drive away. Laguna Golf Phuket and Phuket Country Club are both within easy reach, as well. Royal Phuket Marina is less than twenty kilometers away. Just twenty-two kilometers from Phuket International Airport, Glam Habitat is ideal for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Designed by the multi-award-winning GFAB architects, Villa Blue View is a striking, contemporary villa, perched several yards above sea level in the hills of Koh Samui’s peaceful north coast. Villa Blue View enjoys constant sea breezes and astounding views across the glassy waters of the Thai Gulf to the scenic shores of Phangan island. To the west, you will see the impressive limestone islets of the famous Ang Thong Marine Park.The generous infinity-edge private pool literally pours into the soothing ocean vistas. Thoughtful inclusions like built-in, cushioned day beds and a state-of-the-art barbeque unit in the poolside sala add to the sense of a sophisticated retreat. The dedicated AV room features a sixty-inch 3D television with Chinese, Korean, Taiwanese, Japanese and English channels. There’s also a state-of-the-art Bose sound system for music and Wi-Fi. With an efficient staff catering to guests’ every need, a private chef available at extra cost who prepares delicious Thai and international cuisine, there are very few reasons to leave the stylish surroundings of Villa Blue View.Assertively modern architecture and minimalist designs take full advantage of the outstanding location, and guests benefit from an accomplished balance of refined luxury and natural appeal. Beautifully planted garden areas punctuate the living spaces at all levels, surrounding the villa with tropical greenery, while cutting edge technology compliments the natural ambience. With a fully equipped kitchen with luxury appliances and breakfast bar, all your meals will be a made in style. Private comfort, ease and leisure are central to the personalized holiday experience on offer at Villa Blue View.With a total of five bedrooms, Villa Blue View can accommodate up to twelve guests. Each bedroom includes a king or twin sized bed, en-suite bathroom, air conditioning and balcony. Step into the master suite and enjoy sweeping ocean views, pristine linens and minimalistic design.Those guests looking to explore Samui’s attractions are within easy reach of several beautiful remote beaches, as well as a range of shopping and dining options in nearby Bang Por village or Samui’s modest port town, Nathon. With so many options at Villa Blue View, your Thai vacation is sure to be filled with culture and elegant natural beauty. Come enjoy your vacation haven at Villa Blue View!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With a beachfront location and all the amenities and staff of a boutique luxury resort, villa Upni Duniya offers its eighteen guests the chance to experience what life is like at their private beach resort. Upni Duniya’s unique layout makes it easy for your large group to gather as one, as well as maintain a certain level of personal privacy. This vacation villa is perfect for a large family getaway, destination wedding, or high-level business retreat.Upni Duniya is designed to embrace nature at every opportunity. Decorated with tropical flowers, palm trees, stone features, and ponds, this villa is a bohemian oasis. Inside, you’ll find state of the art appliances and electronics. There’s a fully equipped gym, two kitchens, several lounge areas, and a formal dining area within Upni Duniya’s air-conditioned shared spaces. Outside, you’ll love cooling off in the infinity pool, rejuvenating in the whirlpool spa, and working on your tan for one of many sun loungers and beds. There’s also an alfresco shower, dining area, lounge, and pavilion for you and your guests to enjoy. And, last but certainly not least, you’ll have beachfront access to the incredible Bang Rack Beach, follow the beach path, and you’re there.The Oceanfront Master Suite is outfitted with an oceanside jetted bathtub, a hot tub/grotto, a cinema, cabana, and private access to the beach and pool. Upni Duniya’s eight other bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms and a lengthy list of luxurious amenities. Included with your reservation, you’ll have the help of the villa’s friendly staff, which consists of a manager, housekeepers, security guard, and chef.The best way to experience Koh Samui’s beautiful environment is to get out and interact with it. If there’s a golfer in the group, Santiburi Country Club and Royal Samui Golf Course are two great places to see the lush tropical flora and dynamic ocean views of Thailand. If you’re feeling adventurous, kite surfing, snorkeling, and scuba diving excursions are easy to find around Big Buddha Pier.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Part of the exclusive Samujana community on the northeast coast of the island of Koh Samui, Samujana Nine is a gorgeous luxury villa with breathtaking views of the Gulf of Thailand and elegant design that melds contemporary comfort with Thai tradition. For families, groups of friends, and destination wedding guests seeking a private home base only minutes from the beaches, golf courses, and rainforests of this Southeast Asian gem, this four-bedroom vacation rental is the ideal choice.The villa's design invites you to long days and nights of plein air relaxation. The lovely infinite swimming pool gazes out on ocean views and the distant islands of the archipelago, bordered by the pool deck with sumtuous red loungers. The cozy outdoor/indoor lounge is ideal for sipping cocktails together in the sea breeze, while the beautiful wooden alfresco dining table with seating for ten is where you'll savor delicious meals in the sunset light. The fully equipped kitchen with breakfast bar looks out on the living area, and a poolside grill is perfect for Asian barbeque. Lovely furnishings of natural materials and tones, gurgling fountains in the lush garden, and touches of Buddhist art and décor engender an ambience of centered and joyful sanctuary.The villa's interior is ideally designed for relaxation and play. On the bottom floor, the open-plan lounge and game area is absolutely ideal for fun nights together, featuring a sumptuous lounge with flat screen television, a cocktail bar, a private cinema, and a spectacular game area with pool table, ping pong, and even a charming slide.On the main floor, the villa's bedrooms are perfectly oriented for welcoming the ocean breeze and light, with private terrace access and luminous décor. Three of the bedrooms have king size beds, while the fourth has two twin size beds, and all have ensuite bathrooms with stand-alone showers and large bathtubs.At Samujana, you're ideally positioned to enjoy nights in downtown Koh Samui and long days exploring the stunning natural beauty of the island. Choeng Mon Beach and Chaweng Beach are both five minutes away, and precious rainforest is within minutes. Two beautiful golf courses are also within easy reach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The incredible Koh Samui landscape and thoughtful modern architecture come together to create the stunning Samujana Seven. Built on a hillside overlooking Plai Laem, this luxury vacation rental makes the most of its breathtaking ocean views with open-air living spaces. Relax into the island lifestyle with a resort-worthy pool, beach shuttle and four suite-style bedrooms.Your holiday on the Samujana estate includes breakfast and airport transfers. Staff members are also happy to assist you in planning in-villa cooking or yoga classes, excursions in the area, and weddings and other events. Your villa includes a private infinity pool and a sunny terrace with plenty of loungers and a barbecue.Open walls and a serene water feature make the villa’s great room feel like an extension of the terrace. On one side, low-slung sectionals in the sitting area are a shaded alternative to the chaise longues in the sun. On the other, minimalist benches provide plenty of seating without blocking the views in the dining area. A breakfast bar and wine fridge in the fully equipped kitchen invite guests to grab refreshments and mingle.Each of the four bedrooms at Samujana Seven has a king bed, en-suite bathroom, lounge area and terrace access, so all guests have their own retreat within the house. Large windows and understated furnishings keep the focus on the views from the bedrooms, while an innovative pool on the villa’s roof keeps them naturally cool.Whether you’re traveling on honeymoon, with friends or as a family, you’ll find plenty to love about lively, lush Koh Samui. Samujana makes it easy to explore the island, with complimentary shuttle service to the soft sands and casual vibe of Choeng Mon Beach, and the trendy restaurants and bustling nightlife of equally sandy Chaweng Beach. Tee off underneath the palms at one of several nearby golf courses, find the perfect souvenir in a local boutique or ask Samujana staff to help arrange a yacht charter, scuba adventure or zipline tour.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Villa Malabar is a gorgeous, oceanfront villa on the south shore of the island of Koh Samui. Situated beside the Golden Pagoda at Laem Sor Beach, the villa enjoys private seclusion and panoramic views of the Gulf of Thailand. The contemporary structure combines elegantly minimalist lines and décor with exquisite natural accents that evoke a traditional Indonesian harmony and tranquility. Exterior and interior are seamlessly fused, while five king bedrooms provide ample accommodations for families and multiple couples.The villa's swimming pool, just steps from the ocean's edge, includes deep and shallow areas for guests of all ages. Enjoy a refreshing dip beneath towering palm trees, and savor the delicious sunlight and breeze on poolside loungers and armchairs. After a trip to the beach in the afternoon, gather in the oceanfront sala for Balinese cocktails and barbeque meals from the alfresco kitchen; then linger outdoors at sunset, admiring the extraordinary metamorphosis of the sea and sky.Floor-to-ceiling glass doors invite the ocean air and light into then-concept interior, where a gourmet kitchen serves a breakfast bar, two tables, and a generous lounge area oriented toward the horizon. Continental breakfast is included in the vacation rental, and guests may hire a personal chef to prepare extraordinary Thai meals. From the main living area, pass through a luminous corridor to the media room, with its sumptuous sectional and mounted television. A private office welcomes work and study, while the well-equipped fitness room is perfect for a refreshing workout before cooling off in the pool.The villa's bedrooms all feature king beds, lounge areas, ensuite bathrooms, and direct access to the terrace. The master suite (in the main pavilion) and two primary guest suites (in a separate pavilion) enjoy spectacular ocean views, while their bathrooms include stand-alone showers and terrazzo tubs.From Villa Malabar, you're an easy drive to Nikki Beach, Lemai Beach, and the town of Laem Sor, while the villages of Thong Krut and Taling Ngam are just a few minutes away. Golfers are within easy reach of Royal Samui Golf. Koh Samui Airport is just twenty-five kilometers from Villa Malabar, making it a convenient choice for destination wedding guests.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Featured in The Great Homes of the World section of The New York Times, Villa Fah Sai (meaning “majestic retreat overlooking a tranquil sea”) is an ocean-front home that evokes an idyllic balance between the contemporary grandeur of Frank Lloyd Wright (the famous American architect) and Thai-Japanese timelessness. The front entrance welcomes you into a stretched living room with a view that seduces the eye over an onyx-tiled reflecting pond onto a picturesque panoramic view of the Andaman Sea and Patong Bay.The large double doors of the first level open onto an elegant veranda that welcomes you to a floor that exudes an airy, modern atmosphere with a junior master suite and three additional en-suite bedrooms, one of which may be converted into a spa. The floor also has a games room, fully equipped with a games console, card table and treadmill. Each of these rooms opens onto an expansive travertine pool deck, the perfect place to congregate for sunset cocktails or midnight dips in the fresh water pool. There’s also an indoor jetted tub so you can treat yourself to a luxurious soak without having to leave the comfort of the villa.Walking through the living room, you will pass a dining room that comfortably accommodates a dinner party of 10 and enter into a spacious contemporary kitchen equipped with restaurant quality appliances and a breakfast nook. The gourmet kitchen opens out onto a large terrace, ideal for casual dining and entertainment, and offers an unbelievable unobstructed 180º view of Patong Bay, with its majestic mountains and charming coastline.The master suite is located off the living room and also incorporates the stunning ocean vista. It provides you with 1500 square feet of luxurious privacy, complete with modern western comforts, including a spacious walk-in closet, private retreat and office. There are four additional en-suite bedrooms all with air conditioning and pristine ocean vistas. There’s no better sight when you wake up in the morning.There are beaches to the north and south of Fah Sai at Samsara within a 10-20 minute stroll. Within a 10 minute drive of this incredible vacation home you’ll find Kamala Town, an array of restaurants, as well as a gym and grocery store. Included in the cost are round-trip airport transfers if you don’t plan on renting your own vehicle during your stay.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

Fah Sai is one of a select handful of private residences located within the Samsara Estate. Few – if any – private enclaves in the world match the unsurpassed luxury and privacy of Samsara. Straddling a secluded peninsula, it is a stunning juxtaposition of rocky shoreline, tropical gardens, and calming blue waters. Perched dramatically between 40 to 60 meters above sea level, these oceanfront villas offer spectacular panoramic views to the west and north over the Andaman Sea and Nakalay beach and to the south across Patong Bay.

listing.listing_description: If you seek an incredible Thai vacation, look no further than Samujana Fifteen. This private luxury villa has everything you need, and more. Fifteen is suitable for large family get-togethers, a couples weekend with friends, or even corporate gatherings. With so many unique living spaces and amenities, Samujana Fifteen is sure to win you over.Looking out over the bay, the ample outdoor living space on Fifteen’s balcony and terrace are unparalleled. Relax on a soft sun lounger by the infinity pool. Have an alfresco barbeque lunch while gazing upon Thailand’s beautiful landscapes. When the sun sets, head inside for a formal dinner with seating for eight, then a family movie night in the home cinema room, or bury yourself in a good book in the study.Blurring the line between inside and out and seamlessly merging common spaces are the defining themes of this open concept luxury villa. Modern architecture, simplistic muted tones, and local stone building materials allow the bright beautiful colors of the natural surroundings to capture one’s focus. Floor to ceiling windows help to maintain your connection to nature from the comforts within. Local artwork will make for interesting conversation pieces throughout your stay.With four nearly identical master bedrooms, it’s easy for everyone to have their own private oasis. Each bedroom features a king sized bed, an ensuite bathroom with a stand-alone shower, a tub and bidet, a lounge area, and access to their own private terrace. The four and a half bathrooms are contemporary in decoration and stocked with top of the line fixtures.Just minutes from the Ko Samui Rainforest, the spectacular Bohput Hills Golf Club, and a vibrant downtown main street, this villa is located in a truly dynamic area. And with several world class beaches nearby, you’re sure to have all of your Thai vacation dreams come true.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With two infinity pools, eight en-suite bedrooms, a friendly staff, and instant beachfront access, Inasia acts more like a resort, but this luxury vacation villa is all yours. Beachside lounges, outdoor bars, spacious open concept interiors, and pristine beachfront areas allow you and your guests an unprecedented amount of social space, making it easy to gather as a group or break off for more intimate occasions. Nearby, you’ll find the town of Lamai, Chaweng’s tourism center, golf, and adventure tourism activities.Thai architecture takes modern contemporary style and opens it to embrace the beautiful beachfront environment. With wall-length openings in nearly every room, fresh ocean breeze and natural sunlight have no trouble flowing through Inasia’s luxurious interior. Sleek and stylish designer furniture and high-end electronics decorate Inasia’s lounge areas. In the kitchens, you’ll love the modern-retro style appliances and functional working areas. Connected each separated space, you’ll find stone walkways, vibrant lawns, and mature palm trees.Inasia has four beachfront units and four bedrooms in the Main House, all with en-suite bathrooms, and six come with king-sized beds. Wi-Fi, satellite television, baby equipment, and air conditioning are all included as well. Outside, you’ll have no trouble finding a new spot to enjoy cocktails with friends. The beachside lounge and dining area are perfect for social gatherings. And, with a housekeeper and chef on staff, you’ll have plenty of time to enjoy every bit of your next amazing Luxury Retreats beach getaway.Lipa Noi, to which you’ll have instant beachfront access, is one of Samui’s most private and secluded. The water is shallow and clear, making it perfect for children and casual swimming. If you’re in the mood for a more populated beach, Lamia Beach and Chaweng Beach are two great options; both are lined with luxury resorts, beach bars, and nightlife.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Take yourself away to an idyllic setting at Ban Suriya. This luxury Koh Samui vacation rental, whose name translates to “sunshine house,” sits amid the palms of a former coconut plantation overlooking the white sands of Lipa Noi beach. Invite up to twelve friends or family members to spend a week or two being pampered by the villa’s attentive staff.Your holiday at Ban Suriya begins with an airport transfer for up to ten guests and includes the services of a villa manager, chef, housekeeper and nighttime security staff. Spend your days splashing in the swimming pool and plunge pool, lounging under the palms, enjoying a book or a massage in a treehouse with a massage area and sundeck, or trying local specialties from the barbecue. Other amenities range from an indoor spa and exercise room to a games room and library.High ceilings and fold-away walls let the tropical breezes into the villa’s open-concept rooms. Crisp white and warm wood are carried through the living areas and dining room for a contemporary look, while huge windows showcase views of the lush surroundings. While daily continental breakfast and chef service are included in your stay, there is a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar.Ban Suriya has five bedrooms with king beds, including a honeymoon-worthy master suite with lounge and massage areas, and one bedroom with two twin beds. The king bedrooms have private en-suite bathrooms, while the twin bedroom shares access to a hall bathroom; all six bedrooms have air conditioning.With the gorgeous beach of Lipa Noi just steps away and popular Nikki Beach just a short drive from the villa, the hardest part of your stay may be deciding where to spend the day. If you’ve had your fill of sun and sand, spend an afternoon at the nearby Samui Cultural Center or Wat Samut Tharam temple.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Let the laid-back vibe of Maenam Beach set the tone for your Koh Samui holiday at Villa Sila. Perched above the beach’s gorgeous golden sands, this vacation rental offers panoramic ocean views, expansive outdoor living areas and a host of luxury amenities. Reserve its seven bedrooms for a tropical getaway with family or a sunny escape with friends.Your stay at Villa Sila includes the services of a butler, housekeeper, concierge and in-villa chef, who will be happy to prepare dishes from the villa’s menu, as well as a full breakfast. It also includes a massage for each guest over 16, perhaps best enjoyed at the outdoor massage area. Once you’re fully relaxed, keep the feeling going by the infinity pool, al-fresco lounging and dining areas, and outdoor kitchenette, or in the indoor home theater.A slide-away glass wall connects the villa’s outdoor living areas with its wood-paneled, high-ceilinged great room. A generous table and plenty of seating make it a welcoming space to unwind or watch the sea outside, and a tea- and coffee-making area invites you to stay for a while. There’s also a kitchen with a gas stove, oven, microwave and dishwasher.Villa Sila has five bedrooms with king beds and two bedrooms with two twin beds each. Many of the bedrooms have honeymoon-suite-worthy features such as al-fresco showers and jetted tubs, and all seven have private en-suite bathrooms. Larger parties can use an additional bedroom with three bunk beds plus a twin bed, or reserve nearby Villa Wayu, which has seven bedrooms of its own.From the villa’s location on Maenam Beach, it’s a 5-minute drive to the tennis courts and golf course at the nearby Santiburi Resort, as well as the nearest restaurants and grocery store. For a taste of local specialties or to browse for the perfect souvenir, make the 10-minute drive to the outdoor market at Fisherman’s Village in Bophut.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Panoramic views of Koh Samui’s lush canopy await at this modern hilltop home. Wake up early to catch the sunrise from the sunken lounge alongside the pool on the terrace. Sip your morning coffee while you lay back in a sun lounger, then join the group inside for breakfast. When you’re ready to explore, start with the food stands, shops, and bars at the street market in Fisherman’s Village.Floor-to-ceilings windows connect the terrace and living room, opening the interior to natural sunlight and the fresh hillside breeze. Creamy, white walls set a soothing tone while acting as a canvas for Shyamala’s collection of Thai art. The majority of the interior decor is modern-contemporary, with a few mid-century modern pieces to add that calming retro vibe. After dinner in the formal dining area, mix up a cocktail at the wet bar, and organize a pool tournament. Later, move the party outside to the pool. If you’re keeping up with a fitness routine, the home gym is ready when you are.Grab your camera and head out to snap a few pictures at Koh Samui’s most celebrated temples. Big Buddha, Wat Khunaram, and Wat Plai Laem are all within driving distance.If you’re in the mood to shop, The Wharf Samui and Bophut Plaza are perfect for souvenirs, as well as designer fashion. And at night, head to Chaweng for a vast selection of beachfront bars and buzzing nightclubs.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Samsara Estate Viman Villa 2 is a luxurious oceanfront home that will leave you beguiled by its powerful blend of serenity, subtlety and comfort. Built expansively over three levels on a dramatic hillside seafront plot, its indoor living and dining areas open directly onto dramatic wrap-around decks. Outdoor dining and sunning areas encircle a classic infinity-edge swimming pool which dissolves itself into the ocean and its distant sunsets. This six bedroom villa can comfortably accommodate 14 guests and is ideal for larger groups and extended families.Viman Villa 2 is one of a select handful of private residences located within the Samsara Estate. Few, if any private enclaves in the world match the luxury and privacy of Samsara. Straddling a secluded peninsula, it is a stunning juxtaposition of rocky shoreline, tropical gardens, and calming blue waters. Perched dramatically between 40 to 60 meters above sea level, this ocean-front villa offers spectacular panoramic views to the west and north over the Andaman Sea and Nakalay Beach and to the south across Patong Bay.This property has indoor and outdoor amenities with the ‘WOW’ factor including a projection television room, three separate outdoor jetted tubs and a state-of-the-art centralized sound system. There’s also Wi-Fi access throughout and a games room to keep children of all ages entertained once the sun has set.The villa is tastefully decorated with indoor living, dining, and sleeping areas that combine rich Asian furnishings with modern luxuries. Wooden floors and doors work wonderfully well with the tones of white and cream on the walls, giving an overall ambience of luxury and subtle style.Viman at Samsara has six en-suite bedrooms with air conditioning and majestic views of the ocean that will stay with you always.The nearest town is only a five minute drive away and there are beaches between a 10-20 minute walk from the front door of the villa. Viman Villa 2 is serviced by a full time, live-in staff consisting of one cook and one housekeeper. Trained to anticipate your needs, they’ll look after you with an infectious blend of Thai graciousness and charm. The estate’s manager and front office team complement the villa’s permanent staff, and are available to provide an unmatched level of truly personal service throughout your stay. Complimentary airport transfers are included in your stay (40 minute drive to Phuket International Airport).Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

listing.listing_description: Pass the pool and the palm trees, then dig your feet into the sand on the beachfront of this modern villa in Koh Samui. Stretch out in a sun lounger to work on your vacation tan or retreat to the shady palapa to do a little reading. For dinner, dine alfresco as the sun sets, or head into town to find delicious seafood stands and traditional Thai restaurants in Fisherman’s Village.Bohemian living meets modern luxury at Villa Indu Siam. Indoor and outdoor spaces merge seamlessly, allowing fresh sea breeze and warm sunlight to flow through interior spaces. The fully-equipped kitchen occupies a corner of the open-concept living room, creating a social environment, even when prepping a meal. After you’ve eaten, mix up a tropical cocktail at the wet bar, and challenge a friend to a game of pool. Later on, let the party spill out to the terrace, which will inevitably lead to a pool party. If late-night snacks are in order, fire up the barbecue and grill something fresh from the Fisherman’s Market.If you’re still in the mood to shop, check out The Wharf Samui and Bophut Plaza, two fantastic street malls that offer everything from local crafts to designer fashions. After a day of shopping, treat yourself to a crazy night in Chaweng, the island’s entertainment capital. In Chaweng, you’ll find buzzing nightclubs, beachfront dance parties, and even more dining options. When you need a break, take an afternoon trip to the Big Buddha Temple.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This superb villa is part of the Headland, an exclusive beachfront community at Baan Taling Ngam on the southwest coast of Koh Samui. Set beside the Intercontinental Hotel, it offers exquisite privacy, a pristine beach, and breathtaking views of the Gulf of Thailand and the Five Islands. Your two-bedroom vacation rental offers exquisite serenity within this world-class setting, with ample outdoor living areas, luminous interiors, outstanding staff, and easy beach access. Ideal for small families or couples on honeymoon, the villa can also be rented in conjunction with other villas within The Headland—a superb choice for large family reunions or destination wedding guests.The home is perfectly designed for enjoying the sublime ocean views and delicious breeze. A broad infinity pool stretches the width of the property, with lounge chairs beckoning you to bask in the sunlight and gaze upon the dreamy horizon. A vine-clad veranda extends from the main living room, with a lovely table for meals in the ocean breeze.Broad walls open on three sides of the villa's great room, filling the space with an enchanting alfresco ambiance. Vaulted ceilings house the ample salon and dining table, with a gourmet kitchen presiding over the scene. The mezzanine loft is perched above the great room, and features a comfy sofa bed, television, bathroom, and doors opening to the garden—a lovely nook for quiet afternoons or dreamy nights.The bedrooms feature high ceilings and folding glass doors opening to sweeping vistas. The master suite includes a king bed, while the guestroom has a pair of twin beds. Both rooms are air-conditioned and enjoy ensuite bathrooms.From the beach beneath your villa, you can swim in the luminous sea, enjoy various watersports, or merely admire the spectacular sunset. The neighboring Intercontinental Hotel features wonderful wellness facilities and superb oceanfront dining. The villa is also within walking distance of a Muay Thai center and several superb restaurants in nearby villages, while Muang Waterfalls and Topcats Freshwater Fishing are easily reachable by car. Venture to nearby Nathon for the ferry to Angthong Marine National Park.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Nestled into the lush tropical hillside of Trisara Resort’s picturesque southern bay, Villa 29 offers an incredibly unique atmosphere for twelve visitors to make the most of their sunny Thai vacation. With six, very private, en-suite bedrooms, and plenty of spacious indoor/outdoor hosting area, Villa 29 is perfect for a family getaway, golf trip, or high-end corporate retreat. With the amenities of the resort, and numerous golf courses, restaurants, and attractions nearby, the island of Phuket is yours to discover.Villa 29 has three distinctly different vibes throughout its estate. For soothing relaxation, the upper terrace is the place to be. Decorated with traditional Thai architecture, tropical greenery, and an ocean view as far as the eye can see, you’ll surely spend a fair amount of your trip on the terrace. If you move the party inside, you’ll appreciate Villa 29’s bold, yet elegant, color scheme, with regal reds, deep wood tones, and beautiful marble setting a more formal mood in the upper common areas. On the lower level, the Boathouse features gorgeous teak decking, spanning another incredible ocean vista, and perfect for late night cocktails. Each bedroom at Villa 29 comes with a king or queen sized bed, en-suite bathroom, and a furnished terrace.To make your stay even more luxurious, Villa 29 comes with a full-time housekeeper and chef. The villa has both formal and alfresco dining areas, as well as a wet bar and games room, which are perfect settings for after dinner drinks. Tech features include a home theatre, sound system, Smart television, Wi-Fi, and more. On the terrace, you’ll love cooling off in the infinity swimming pool while you gaze upon the amazing ocean view.Within a few short kilometers, you’ll have access to Layan, Dream, Naithon, and Banana Beach, the latter being the closest. If you’re in Thailand to golf, two of the island’s best courses are located within fifteen kilometers, Laguna Phuket and Blue Canyon golf clubs. And, the Boat Avenue Mall is perfect if you’re in the mood to shop.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Baan Santisuk is an enchanting villa in Kamala on the island of Phuket. Situated within walking distance of Kamala Beach, the villa features panoramic ocean views from its ample outdoor living areas, along with exquisite interiors and five superb bedroom suites, all with furnished outdoor spaces and ocean views. Blending beautiful traditional style with high-end contemporary design, this luxury vacation rental provides a unique yet consummate experience of coastal Thailand.The estate is perched on a hillside amid lush gardens, providing an utterly serene and private setting to gather with family or entertain guests. Two exquisite salas—one large and bi-level, one small—stand beside the infinite swimming pool. Savor delightful days in the South Pacific sun, floating in the pool's crystalline waters, relaxing on elegant sun loungers, and beholding spectacular vistas of the verdant shoreline and turquoise sea. Enjoy afternoons in the small pavilion, sipping cool cocktails in the lavish lounge. At sunset, gaze on the sublime views from the rooftop terrace.The main sala features an ample lounge and beautiful dining table just beside the pool, with open walls allowing a lovely flow of space and air. The upper level includes another lounge and dining area, with privileged views of the sea below. Your private chef will prepare delectable Thai feasts in the fully equipped kitchen, paired with a fine wine from the fridge or cocktails mixed at the wet bar. At night, cuddle with your favorite movies in the outstanding entertainment room with large screen projector and sound system. Refresh your body in the morning in the well-appointed fitness room.The villa features five extraordinary bedroom suites, four with one double bed each, and one with two twin beds. All have ensuite bathrooms, three with alfresco showers, while the master suite enjoys an alfresco tub as well. Four of the suites have balconies, while one opens to the pool terrace. Floor-to-ceiling glass walls provide each room with beautiful ocean views and a dreamy breeze. With accommodations for ten, the villa is ideal for families and destination wedding guests.Baan Santisuk enjoys one of the finest locations on Phuket. Less than a kilometer to Kamala Beach, you're just minutes by car from Surin Beach, Patong Beach, and the nightlife of downtown Patong.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
