listing.listing_description: Make your dreams of a tropical destination wedding, family reunion or yoga retreat come true at Samujana Twelve. Designed to host groups of up to fourteen in contemporary style, this luxury Koh Samui vacation rental features postcard-worthy ocean views, incredible amenities and gorgeous open-air living spaces.Set on a double lot, Samujana Twelve is expansive, private and full of ways to play or relax. The outdoor living areas feature two pools, a basketball court, trampoline and even a boxing ring, as well as living and dining areas, a barbecue and a serene rooftop garden. The indoor amenities are equally impressive, from the yoga sala and commercial-grade gym to a home theater that seats twenty and a games room with a wet bar, pool and foosball tables, ping-pong and more.Walking into the villa feels like stepping into a magazine spread, thanks to the villa’s peaceful water features, textured stone walls, intriguing local artwork and dramatic sightlines to the ocean and hilly coast. Open-sided living areas with sunken, built-in sectionals, long dining tables and fully equipped kitchens tucked behind paneling forge a strong connection to the island landscape; in one of the great rooms, the kitchen is backed by a natural waterfall to stunning effect.Each of the seven bedrooms is a retreat in its own right, with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, sitting area and terrace. Five of the bedrooms, including the master suite, even have their own hot tub for a truly decadent feel.Your holiday at Samujana includes daily breakfast and airport transfers, and if you’d like, the estate staff can help arrange activities like honeymoon-style yacht charters, scenic games of golf or thrilling zipline rides over the jungle. It’s also easy to explore on your own, since the villa is just above quiet Plai Laem and 5 minutes from both the tranquil stretch of Choeng Mon Beach and the oceanfront restaurants along Chaweng Beach.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Baan Paradise is an extraordinary oceanfront villa in Lamai on the Thai island of Koh Samui. Situated on the island's southeast shore, the villa borders a beautiful, white-sand beach for relaxation and dining, and is just minutes from Lamai Beach and some of the finest golf courses in Thailand. With spectacular ocean views, superb outdoor and indoor living areas, and five deluxe bedroom suites (all with ensuite bathrooms and terrace access), this luxury vacation rental is ideal for multiple couples, families, large groups of friends, and destination wedding guests.Surrounded by lush gardens and towering palm trees, the villa features multiple relaxation areas for savoring the exquisite South Pacific sun. Enjoy enchanting hours in the beautiful infinite swimming pool, relaxing on elegant loungers beneath parasols, and sipping cool refreshments in the sunny lounge. Returning from the beach in the afternoon, mix delicious cocktails at the wet bar, play a game of pool, and cook a delicious barbeque lunch. The outstanding living-and-dining pavilion features a gorgeous table and sumptuous lounge areas just steps from the shore—a perfect place to dine or merely luxuriate in the ocean air.Large glass doors open from the pool terrace to the villa's interior, creating a wonderfully seamless space for evening entertainment. The lovely kitchen is fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and ample cocktail bar, and gracefully serves the gorgeous dining table for ten. The lounge with TV and surround sound is perfect for relaxing nights together, while the well-appointed fitness room offers a refreshing start to the day. Throughout the villa, the exquisite décor and design inspire a tranquil vitality.The villa features five enchanting bedroom suites: a master suite with king bed, and four guest suites with queen beds. All have private lounges, TVs, safes, direct access to furnished private terraces, and ensuite bathrooms with dual vanity and stand-alone rain shower. The master bathroom features a jetted tub as well.At Baan Paradise, you'll enjoy a supreme balance of seclusion and convenience. You're about three kilometers from Lamai Beach, and an easy drive to Nikki Beach and Thongyang Beach. Golfers are just ten kilometers from Royal Samui Golf Club and an easy drive to Bophut Hills Golf Club.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
